title: What are the photos of all the times Sonali Bendre looked effortlessly stylish? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1.We love Sonali Bendre's personal style, which can be described as elegant and understated. So we trawled through her Instagram to dig out photos where she stunned us with her choices. Take a look.  2.The actor looked pretty in this dress, and plus points for the pocket!  3.We loved Sonali in this sari which was accessorised with a wide belt.  4.She looked dapper in this blazer look.  5.At the Jaipur Literature Festival, she was seen in an ethnic ensemble that stood out for all the layering. :  6 .She looked elegant in a sari she celebrated Ganesh Chaturthi this year. : )  7.We dig this look, and especially the hairdo.  8.She kept things simple in this ethnic outfit. : )  Edit: If you like my content please do follow and Upvoted Thank You 😊
